meta.name: GPT 4.1 - Freelancer.com Job Alert System with Auto Proposal Generator

nodes.name: Fetch Freelancer.com RSS
nodes.notes:
üåê RSS FETCH ‚Äî Setup
Fetches the latest jobs from Freelancer.com.

CUSTOMIZE URL:
‚Ä¢ ?keyword=wordpress
‚Ä¢ &min_price=500
‚Ä¢ &max_price=5000

Example:
https://www.freelancer.com/rss.xml?keyword=wordpress&min_price=500

üí° Use multiple RSS nodes for multiple keywords.

nodes.name: Filter Job Quality
nodes.notes:
‚úÖ QUALITY FILTER ‚Äî Customize
Current rules:
‚Ä¢ Description > 100 chars
‚Ä¢ Posted within last 2 hours

OPTIONAL:
‚Ä¢ Budget thresholds (if present in feed)
‚Ä¢ Required/excluded keywords

TIP: Start loose, tighten after 1‚Äì2 days.

nodes.name: AI Job Analyzer
nodes.notes:
üß† AI ANALYZER ‚Äî Setup
Scores the job 1‚Äì10, explains reasoning, flags risks, and classifies client type.

TIP: Keep wishlist specific to reduce noise.

nodes.name: Structured Output Parser
nodes.notes:
üß© OUTPUT PARSER ‚Äî Stability
Forces strict JSON so downstream filters/logging never break.

nodes.name: AI Proposal Generator
nodes.notes:
‚úçÔ∏è PROPOSAL WRITER ‚Äî Customize
Edit "My Skills" / "My Experience" and drop one relevant portfolio link.

üí° 90% done by AI ‚Üí add 10% personal touch.

nodes.name: Log to Google Sheets
nodes.notes:
üìä JOB LOGGER ‚Äî Setup
Append/Update by Link to avoid duplicates.

Recommended columns: Timestamp | Job | Description | Link | AI Score | Reasoning | Red Flags | Client Type | AI Proposal | Alert Timestamp.

nodes.name: Send Telegram Alert
nodes.notes:
üì± TELEGRAM ‚Äî Setup
Create bot with @BotFather ‚Üí add token in credentials ‚Üí DM your bot ‚Üí get Chat ID via @userinfobot and paste here.

TIP: Add buttons via your own webhook for Skip / Applied.

nodes.name: Schedule: Every 5 Minutes1
nodes.notes:
‚è∞ TRIGGER ‚Äî Schedule
Runs this workflow every 5 minutes.

‚úèÔ∏è CUSTOMIZE:
‚Ä¢ 3 min = ultra-competitive niches
‚Ä¢ 10‚Äì15 min = lower API cost

üí° TIP: Start at 5 min and tune after 1‚Äì2 days based on alert volume.

nodes.name: Settings (Keyword & Wishlist)1
nodes.notes:
‚öôÔ∏è SETTINGS ‚Äî Setup
Define your main keyword and your "wish list" criteria.

Examples:
‚Ä¢ Job Keyword: shopify, react, seo
‚Ä¢ Wishlist: "Budget > $500, clear scope, no vague fixed-price"

üí° TIP: Clone this node to run multiple keywords in parallel (merge later).

nodes.name: Load Seen Links (Google Sheets)1
nodes.notes:
üì• DEDUPE SOURCE ‚Äî Setup
Loads previously processed links from your tracking sheet.

SETUP:
‚Ä¢ Use the same spreadsheet as the logger
‚Ä¢ Column "Link" must exist

üîí Prevents duplicate alerts.

nodes.name: Collect Seen Links1
nodes.notes:
üßÆ AGGREGATE ‚Äî Setup
Builds a quick lookup of already seen links for the dedupe filter.

nodes.name: De-duplicate by Link1
nodes.notes:
üö´ DEDUPE ‚Äî Customize
Only pass jobs whose link is not already in your sheet.

TIP: If your source has unstable links, switch to a hash of (title+date).

nodes.name: LLM (OpenAI)1
nodes.notes:
‚öôÔ∏è LLM BACKEND ‚Äî Setup
Used by Analyzer & Proposal nodes.

TIP: Use gpt-4o-mini for speed/cost unless you need richer reasoning.

nodes.name: Gate: Score ‚â•
nodes.notes:
üéØ SCORE GATE ‚Äî Customize
Only pass jobs with score ‚â• 7.

6 = more alerts, 8 = only premium.

nodes.name: CV (Sheets Tool)1
nodes.notes:
üõ†Ô∏è SHEETS TOOL ‚Äî Optional
For advanced automations (e.g., pulling portfolio snippets). Safe to disable initially.
